name: Demolia
info: A Sinner adept at defending. Can block 2 enemies at the same time and increase Max HP by 10%.
criminalRecord:
Violently resisted law enforcement as well as harbored and protected an important escaped Sinner [[[Demon]]], possibly in collusion with the key criminal. During the evidence collection process, the subject refused to cooperate in the legal interrogations by the investigation unit and obstructed law enforcement by assaulting several Eastside sheriffs.

--

After the subject's arrest, the Bureau once received serious protests from her community. Visits to her neighbors reveal that the previous allegation against her is likely just a misunderstanding. The subject has a kind heart and often helps homeless people. Even Sinner Demon has once received help from her. The local law enforcement handled the case poorly and has already been advised to rectify their mistakes. The subject behaves well in her detention and requires no further correction.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Able to accelerate metabolism and enhance muscle strength, resulting in extraordinary physical power and increased resistance to attacks. Paired with the fitted mallet, the subject can serve as an effective source of attack power for a short period

+++* Awakening Signs
Experienced an emergency awakening during a confrontation with the investigation unit. Possesses an exceptional gift and could control her special powers perfectly the first time.

+++* Corruption State
No corruption symptoms detected so far. All indicators are normal and the sleep quality is particularly good, possibly related to the subject's gift for controlling her powers.
ecbFlavourText: "Drink moderately, exercise daily, and keep a good mood... these are my wellness rules."
arrestRec1: During a mission to infiltrate Syndicate, a team of Sinners from the MBCC encountered the subject who was receiving treatment at SALVA Hospital. While performing a heroic act, the subject's Sinner identity was exposed and the subject was immediately arrested and added to the force.
arrestRec2: Born on the border between Eastside and Syndicate. After the early death of the subject's parents, the subject could not sustain education and had to make a living by scavenging, ending up learning all basic life skills alone.
arrestRec3: Had an excellent reputation among the locals for being warm-hearted and genuine. Despite not having a regular job, the subject still helped neighbors with income earned from scavenging and odd gigs, secretly supporting impoverished children who couldn't afford to go to school.
arrestRec4: Always keen on sheltering the underdog in society, the subject took the wanted criminal //Demon// home for treatment after he suffered a severe injury and lost consciousness, mistaking him for a pitiful homeless man. Unwilling to betray others' trust, the subject obstructed the investigation unit's mission by violent means.
servingTerm1: After learning the primary functions of the MBCC, the subject adapted to the bureau's environment at a shocking speed and never once had the idea to escape. The subject seems almost //too// at ease at times and once even wanted to request a balcony for sunbathing, but the request was rejected by the logistics department.
servingTerm2: The subject is extremely familiar with the recycling values of all kinds of used items and carefully keeps in the detention room a //collection// gathered from years of scavenging. However, most of these items have already been discarded as trash by the cleaning staff.
servingTerm3: With an outgoing and kind character, the subject has gotten along well with everyone in the MBCC shortly, but occasionally receives warnings from Nightingale and other more aloof Sinners for overly frequent visits.
servingTerm4: Obsessed with philosophical exchanges with the Chief and will not let up before covering every topic from scavenging to the meaning of life. This obsession seriously disturbed the Chief's daily work. After realizing the problem, the subject came to apologize to the Chief and presented a precious gift picked from the private collection.
emotionCheck1:
[Demolia is counting her collection.]

**Demolia:** Would you like to help me expand my collection, Chief?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** The Bureau has some building materials left. And some of them are high-quality.
 * **Demolia:** I want the more precious kind! Not this!
 * **Demolia:** üòïüòï

* **Prompt:** Hmm... What about the dueler headscarf we found a while back?
 * **Demolia:** Wow... Though it seems a bit old, it actually looks pretty awesome on me!
 * **Demolia:** üòêüòâ
emotionCheck2:
[Now that the mission is over, Demolia starts to arrange her subsequent schedule.]

**Demolia:** What will we be doing today? Recommend something to me, Chief.

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Let's play chess.
 * **Demolia:** Oh! Good idea! Let's play the DisChess!
 * **Demolia:** üòâ üòè

* **Prompt:** Let's do some studying.
 * **Demolia:** Oh, no. Come on. There is no way I'm going to study even if you send me to the Rust for missions!
 * **Demolia:** üòñüòñüòñ
supervision1:
++* ‚ö† External Personnel

//The employees at the Supply Office made a banner for Demolia.//

**System Notifications:** Commodity prices rose, and Supply Office staff tried to negotiate to no avail. After two hours of intense bargaining, Demolia scored an even cheaper deal, saving lots of money for the Bureau.

* **Prompt:** I knew I could count on you!
supervision2:
++* ‚ö† Not Garbage!

//Demolia shuts herself in a Confinement Cell.//

**System Notifications:** Demolia plans to make a gift for you using her precious "loots." However, before she could finish the gift, cleaning staff mistook it for garbage and disposed of it. She was depressed for several days.

* **Prompt:** Comfort Demolia
supervision3:
++* ‚ö† Pickled Vegetables

//It is the season for vegetable pickling again.//

**System Notifications:** It's the season for vegetable pickling again. Demolia sent pickled vegetables she just made to every Sinner and employee. And she sent double portions to her dearest Chief.

* **Prompt:** Thank you.

**Chief:** Another winter, another time of the year when I don't need to shop for pickled vegetables at the grocery store.

**Demolia:** Hehe. You're getting more from me next year.
supervision4:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† A Round of Chess

//Demolia is knocking on your door like crazy.//

**System Notifications:** Demolia is knocking on your door like crazy.

**Demolia:** Chief, Chief! do you have a moment?

**Chief:** I guess so...

**Chief:** What's wrong?

**Demolia:** That's great! Would you play DisChess with me?

**Chief:** I thought we did that two days ago.

**Demolia:** Chief, you don't understand. I learned a few new tricks over the past few days. I'm sure I can defeat you this time!

* **Prompt:** I see...
* **Prompt:** Guess there's no other option.

**System Notifications:** Ten minutes later...

**Demolia:** Oh, come on. Why did I lose so quickly again? This can't be happening!

**Demolia:** Chief, wait until I go study some more. We'll have a rematch next week! Then, I will surely defeat you!

**Chief:** ...

**Chief:** If only you had such passion whenever you were on a mission, that'd be nice.
supervision5:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† After-Sales Service

//You received an internal message.//

**System Notifications:** Demolia the Sinner requests a call with you. Approve?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**Demolia:** Chief, have you eaten the pickled vegetables I sent you? What do you think of the taste?

**Chief:** I've been enjoying them these few days.

**Chief:** I realized that after I tasted your pickled vegetables, I can never go back to those sold at the supermarket.

**Demolia:** Haha. That's great to hear! I was worried you might not like them.

**Demolia:** Is there anything you think I can improve on those pickled vegetables?

**Chief:** Well... if I must think of something...

**Chief:** I think they are a bit too salty. You can consider putting less salt next time.

**Demolia:** Okay. Noted.

**Demolia:** Chief, would you like me to send you more of those?

* **Prompt:** There's no need.
* **Prompt:** Thank you but I'm good.

**Chief:** There really is no space left in my cabinet, so...
supervision6:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† An Elder's Lifestyle

//You hear the sound of Demolia sighing from a distance.//

**System Notifications:** You hear the sound of Demolia sighing from a distance.

**Demolia:** Sigh. Chief, the young people these days should really rethink their lifestyles.

**Chief:** What's wrong?

**Demolia:** A regular lifestyle leads to a healthy life.

**Demolia:** It's not good for them staying up late at night and staying in bed in the morning.

* **Prompt:** Do you mean...
* **Prompt:** Why am I feeling guilty...?

**Demolia:** Take those who live on the other side of my room for example. They were chatting before I went to bed yesterday. And they were still chatting when I woke up.

**Chief:** Uh... When did you wake up exactly?

**Demolia:** I even checked my watch. It was ten fifteen. No more. No less.

**Chief:** ...

**Chief:** But here in the Bureau, we turn off the lights at ten thirty.
supervision7:
++* ‚ö†‚ö†‚ö† The Popular One

//The result of "The Most Popular Staff Member" vote is finally revealed today.//

**System Notifications:** The result of //The Most Popular Staff Member// vote is finally revealed today. You read out her name at the staff meeting.

**Chief:** The most popular staff member of the Bureau is... Demolia?!

**Bureau Staff:** "Yay!"
"I voted for her too!"
"Besides her dislike of the uniform, she has no other faults."
"Demolia is truly warm-hearted!"

**Chief:** Do Sinners... count as the Bureau's staff?

**System Notifications:** The venue falls silent for a while. Next, you hear lots of whispers confirming something.

**Bureau Staff:** "Wait, she's a Sinner?"
"I couldn't tell at all!"
"I thought she was a security guard or janitor this whole time..."

* **Prompt:** Go on to present the prize
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to continue presenting the prize and invite Demolia to come up on the stage.
 * **Demolia:** What? Is this trophy for me?
 * **Demolia:** I'm... so touched!
 * **Demolia:** Friends in the Bureau, please rest assured! I'll continue to work hard! Let's do our best together!
 * **Demolia:** Let's work hard together! Tomorrow will be a better day!
 * **System Notifications:** With Demolia's uplifting slogans, the applause in the audience goes on for a long while.

* **Prompt:** Change the prize
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to modify the prize to "The Most Popular Person" and invite Demolia to come up on the stage.
 * **Demolia:** What? Is this trophy for me?
 * **Demolia:** I'm... so touched!
 * **Demolia:** Friends in the Bureau, please rest assured! I'll continue to work hard! Let's do our best together!
 * **Demolia:** Let's work hard together! Tomorrow will be a better day!
 * **System Notifications:** With Demolia's uplifting slogans, the applause in the audience goes on for a long while.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
M...B...CC... is that right? I've heard of your place! There are a lot of Sinners there. Enough chitchat, let me in!

[Raise to Phase 1]
Ah... strength is like collecting garbage. The more you collect, the stronger you become.

[Raise to Phase 3]
Yes. As expected. It's better to be stronger. The earlier I get off work, the better I sleep.

[Level Start]
I bet I can find a lot of treasures on this trip.

[Win Battles]
What's that thing called... from the book... oh right! Hardness triumphs over softness, strength over feebleness!

[Lose Battles]
Run! They're catching up!

[Ultimate Skill]
Stop!

[Die in Battles]
You are not allowed to go there...

[Greeting]
Where are we going today to scavenge... no, I mean, to catch Sinners?

[Conversation 1]
The people from the procurement office always spend money like crazy. I'll have to give them a talking to. Money doesn't grow on trees, you know?

[Conversation 2]
Want to come play DisChess? They're not here, so let's just play with the two of us. Chief, don't go! Try it out! It's fun!

[Conversation 3]
"Don't treat others' gossip as gifts, because you're not a garbage collector." Huh? Is this line in the book making fun of me, Chief? No? Good, I'll write it down then.

[Special Conversation 1]
Slaying Corruptors is my job, but enjoying life is more important.

[Special Conversation 2]
Chief, did you stay up late again? You can't keep doing that! Young people need their sleep.

[Special Conversation 3]
Compared to where I used to live, this place is too fancy! I'd rather sleep in the hallway and give my bed so the kids from the Syndicate.

[Full Compliance]
Chief, since we're so close already, I'll cut to the chase‚Äîwhen will the balcony I applied for be approved?

[Idle]
When can we go to the Rust together again? There's a new shipment over there. I hear there are some light track construction materials. If we scavenge some, we can make a fortune!

[Annoyed]
Oh yeah! Right there! Harder! Wow... feels so good...

[Special Attention]
Huh? I'm the only one left standing here? No! That's so boring!

[Dispatch]
Chief, the weather is so nice today! Won't you come along?

[Dispatch Complete]
Harvest time! I can't fit everything in my cart!

[Level Up]
Huh? This hammer seems lighter.
nightmareTalent: All allied units gain a 12% Max HP boost.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: My Life
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When Demolia's HP is more than 60%/50%/40%, she can block 1 more enemy.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "Drink moderately, exercise daily, and keep a good mood... these are my wellness rules."

pros: High HP, great for McQueen ECB burst
cons: Almost no utility, just blocks and tanks

crimebrandSets.name: Tanky
crimebrandSets.note: Standard tanky build, increases defense and block.

crimebrandSets.name: Energy Tanky
crimebrandSets.note: Alternative tanky build, increases defense and energy.

crimebrandSets.name: Dispelling Tanky
crimebrandSets.note: Alternative tanky build, increases defense while also dispelling negative effects from herself. Can be useful if tanking in some stages that have negative status effects like poison and burn.

shackles.title: Comeback
shackles.description: [Rally] The number of recharges increased by 1.

shackles.title: Bounce Back
shackles.description: After Demolia uses [Rally], she recovers 2% of her Max HP per second for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Thud!
skills.description: Demolia swings her huge hammer, dealing (119% of Attack damage) Physical Damage each time.

skills.name: Rally
skills.description: Demolia gets on her feet, restoring 30% of her Max HP.

skills.name: Blocker
skills.description: For each enemy she blocks, Demolia gains a 5% bonus in healing received. The effect can stack up to 3 times.

skills.name: Unity
skills.description: When an allied Sinner uses their Ultimate, Demolia instantly restores 4% of her Max HP. The effect has 3-second cooldown.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Magic Resistance +7, Health +81
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Magic Resistance +7, Health +81, Unlock Requirementss: Dispatch Demolia 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Obedience Full, Rusty River Scavengers
